body:
### Steps to reproduce

By listing `aws-parallelcluster` package versions you can see there are multiple versions available (latest one is 2.11.4) but when installing it without specifying a version I got version 2.8.1 instead of the latest one. Then I'm unable to install all the version after 2.8.1 even if manually specified.

```
$ spack versions aws-parallelcluster
==> Safe versions (already checksummed):
  2.11.4  2.11.3  2.11.2  2.11.1  2.11.0  2.10.4  2.10.3  2.10.2  2.10.1  2.10.0  2.9.1  2.9.0  2.8.1  2.8.0  2.7.0  2.6.1  2.6.0  2.5.1  2.5.0
==> Remote versions (not yet checksummed):
  3.1.0b1  3.0.2  3.0.1  3.0.0b1  3.0.0  2.4.1  2.4.0  2.3.2a1  2.3.1  2.2.1  2.1.1  2.1.0  2.0.2  2.0.1  2.0.0rc1  2.0.0

$ spack install aws-parallelcluster
...
==> Installing aws-parallelcluster-2.8.1-jmr3os7s3hznzaowos6xwqcbpd7upyyh
==> No binary for aws-parallelcluster-2.8.1-jmr3os7s3hznzaowos6xwqcbpd7upyyh found: installing from source
==> Fetching https://mirror.spack.io/_source-cache/archive/c1/c183dc3f053bc2445db724e561cea7f633dd5e7d467a7b3f9b2f2f703f7d5d49.tar.gz
==> No patches needed for aws-parallelcluster
==> aws-parallelcluster: Executing phase: 'build'
==> aws-parallelcluster: Executing phase: 'install'
==> aws-parallelcluster: Successfully installed aws-parallelcluster-2.8.1-jmr3os7s3hznzaowos6xwqcbpd7upyyh
  Fetch: 0.98s.  Build: 0.69s.  Total: 1.67s.
[+] /home/ec2-user/spack/opt/spack/linux-amzn2-skylake_avx512/gcc-7.3.1/aws-parallelcluster-2.8.1-jmr3os7s3hznzaowos6xwqcbpd7upyyh
```

If I try to install the specific version manually it works for version < 2.8.0 but not for > 2.8.1
```
$ spack install aws-parallelcluster@2.11.4
==> Error: aws-parallelcluster@2.11.4 is unsatisfiable, errors are:
  no version satisfies the given constraints

    To see full clingo unsat cores, re-run with `spack --show-cores=full`
    For full, subset-minimal unsat cores, re-run with `spack --show-cores=minimized
    Warning: This may take (up to) hours for some specs

$ spack install aws-parallelcluster@2.9.1
==> Error: aws-parallelcluster@2.9.1 is unsatisfiable, errors are:
  no version satisfies the given constraints
...

$ spack install aws-parallelcluster@2.10.0
==> Error: aws-parallelcluster@2.10.0 is unsatisfiable, errors are:
  no version satisfies the given constraints
...

$ spack install aws-parallelcluster@2.11.0
==> Error: aws-parallelcluster@2.11.0 is unsatisfiable, errors are:
  no version satisfies the given constraints
...

$ spack install aws-parallelcluster@2.8.0
...
==> Installing aws-parallelcluster-2.8.0-jwa7xi3k34lyujnmj6stsievbmjomaok
==> No binary for aws-parallelcluster-2.8.0-jwa7xi3k34lyujnmj6stsievbmjomaok found: installing from source
==> Fetching https://mirror.spack.io/_source-cache/archive/4e/4e67539d49fe987884a3ed7198dc13bc8a3a1778f0b3656dfe0ae899138678f2.tar.gz
==> No patches needed for aws-parallelcluster
==> aws-parallelcluster: Executing phase: 'install'
==> aws-parallelcluster: Successfully installed aws-parallelcluster-2.8.0-jwa7xi3k34lyujnmj6stsievbmjomaok
  Fetch: 0.86s.  Build: 1.04s.  Total: 1.90s.
[+] /home/ec2-user/spack/opt/spack/linux-amzn2-skylake_avx512/gcc-7.3.1/aws-parallelcluster-2.8.0-jwa7xi3k34lyujnmj6stsievbmjomaok
```

Could you help me to understand if there is something wrong in the package? Thanks.
For completeness I'm attaching also `spack info` output.

```
$ spack info aws-parallelcluster
PythonPackage:   aws-parallelcluster

Description:
    AWS ParallelCluster is an AWS supported Open Source cluster management
    tool to deploy and manage HPC clusters in the AWS cloud.

Homepage: https://github.com/aws/aws-parallelcluster

Maintainers: @demartinofra @enrico-usai @lukeseawalker

Externally Detectable:
    False

    None

    2.11.4    https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/source/a/aws-parallelcluster/aws-parallelcluster-2.11.4.tar.gz

Safe versions:
    2.11.4    https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/source/a/aws-parallelcluster/aws-parallelcluster-2.11.4.tar.gz
    2.11.3    https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/source/a/aws-parallelcluster/aws-parallelcluster-2.11.3.tar.gz

    2.9.1     https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/source/a/aws-parallelcluster/aws-parallelcluster-2.9.1.tar.gz
    2.9.0     https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/source/a/aws-parallelcluster/aws-parallelcluster-2.9.0.tar.gz
    2.8.1     https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/source/a/aws-parallelcluster/aws-parallelcluster-2.8.1.tar.gz
    2.8.0     https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/source/a/aws-parallelcluster/aws-parallelcluster-2.8.0.tar.gz
    2.7.0     https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/source/a/aws-parallelcluster/aws-parallelcluster-2.7.0.tar.gz
    2.6.1     https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/source/a/aws-parallelcluster/aws-parallelcluster-2.6.1.tar.gz
    2.6.0     https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/source/a/aws-parallelcluster/aws-parallelcluster-2.6.0.tar.gz
    2.5.1     https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/source/a/aws-parallelcluster/aws-parallelcluster-2.5.1.tar.gz
    2.5.0     https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/source/a/aws-parallelcluster/aws-parallelcluster-2.5.0.tar.gz

Deprecated versions:
    None

Variants:
    None

Installation Phases:
    install

Build Dependencies:
    py-boto3  py-configparser  py-enum34  py-future  py-ipaddress  py-jinja2  py-pip  py-pyyaml  py-setuptools  py-tabulate  py-wheel  python

Link Dependencies:
    None

Run Dependencies:
    py-boto3  py-configparser  py-enum34  py-future  py-ipaddress  py-jinja2  py-pyyaml  py-setuptools  py-tabulate  python

Virtual Packages:
    None
```


### Error message

